Computer Search Capabilites

Thank you for viewing my game! I decided early on that undertaking the challenge of designing a ruthless opponent would be far more satisfying than the standard randomized search. Below you can find some of the AI search capabilities.

General Sweep Patterns

The general sweep has 4 randomized origins to remove the advantage of knowing where the computer search may start.

Origin 1
Origin 2
Origin 3
Origin 4

Hit Search Capabilities

Adaptive Search

The AI uses process of elimination to determine the optimal gapping during the sweep search phase. The default gap is configured to search every other cell, but as shown below, the gap can grow to four if the conditions permit. The advantage doesn't truly begin until the destroyer is sunk. So hide your destroyer at all costs!

Cluster Detection

When a cluster is detected, a queue is modeled, allowing for the search of the current ship before moving to the next.
